astrosync.screen.description.failure: AstroSync has detected a new pack version, but failed to download it.
astrosync.screen.restart.failure: Restart to try again. If the problem persists, delete the 'astrosync' folder in the game directory.
astrosync.screen.description.success: AstroSync has detected and downloaded a new pack version successfully.
astrosync.screen.restart.success: Restart the game to take effect.
